name: cip
title: Centralized Information Provider
description: Exports bookmarks and open tabs to a centralised folder
author: Pierre Laperdrix

preferences.name: passwordStorage
preferences.title: Enable passwords storage
preferences.description: If this option is enabled, passwords will be stored in the data file. If encryption is disabled, passwords will be stored in plaintext.

preferences.name: passwordEncryption
preferences.title: Enable passwords encryption
preferences.description: If this option is enabled, the user will need to enter a Master Password to securely encrypt his passwords.
